trans-unit.source: Create a Logic App
trans-unit.target: Create a Logic App

trans-unit.source: Use an Azure Resource Manager template to deploy an empty Logic App for defining workflows.
trans-unit.target: Use an Azure Resource Manager template to deploy an empty Logic App for defining workflows.

trans-unit.source: Create a Logic App using a template
trans-unit.target: Create a Logic App using a template

trans-unit.source: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template to create an empty logic app that can be used to define workflows.
trans-unit.target: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template to create an empty logic app that can be used to define workflows.

trans-unit.source: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and
trans-unit.target: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and

trans-unit.source: how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.
trans-unit.target: how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.

trans-unit.source: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.
trans-unit.target: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.

trans-unit.source: For more details on the Logic app properties, see <link><linkText>Logic App Workflow Management API</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more details on the Logic app properties, see <link><linkText>Logic App Workflow Management API</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For examples of the definition itself, see <link><linkText>Author Logic App definitions</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For examples of the definition itself, see <link><linkText>Author Logic App definitions</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating templates, see <link><linkText>Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about creating templates, see <link><linkText>Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For the complete template, see <link><linkText>Logic App template</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For the complete template, see <link><linkText>Logic App template</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: What you will deploy
trans-unit.target: What you will deploy

trans-unit.source: With this template, you will deploy a logic app.
trans-unit.target: With this template, you will deploy a logic app.

trans-unit.source: To run the deployment automatically, click the following button:
trans-unit.target: To run the deployment automatically, click the following button:

trans-unit.source: [<linkText>Deploy to Azure</linkText>](https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.Template/uri/https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2FAzure%2Fazure-quickstart-templates%2Fmaster%2F101-logic-app-create%2Fazuredeploy.json)

trans-unit.target: Parameters

trans-unit.source: testUri
trans-unit.target: testUri

trans-unit.source: Resources to deploy
trans-unit.target: Resources to deploy

trans-unit.source: App service plan
trans-unit.target: App service plan

trans-unit.source: Creates an app service plan.
trans-unit.target: Creates an app service plan.

trans-unit.source: It uses the same location as the resource group to which it is being deployed.
trans-unit.target: It uses the same location as the resource group to which it is being deployed.

trans-unit.source: Logic app
trans-unit.target: Logic app

trans-unit.source: Creates the logic app.
trans-unit.target: Creates the logic app.

trans-unit.source: The templates uses a parameter value for the logic app name.
trans-unit.target: The templates uses a parameter value for the logic app name.

trans-unit.source: It sets the location of the logic app to the same location as the resource group.
trans-unit.target: It sets the location of the logic app to the same location as the resource group.

trans-unit.source: This particular definition will run once an hour, and ping the location specified in the testUri parameter.
trans-unit.target: This particular definition will run once an hour, and ping the location specified in the testUri parameter.
